title: 3 Simple Ways to Add a Google Account on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open your Settings .
steps.content: Open your Settings . You’ll usually find this icon on the home screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Mail.
steps.content: Tap Mail . You can find this underneath Passwords .

steps.title: Tap Accounts.
steps.content: Tap Accounts . This will be towards the middle of the screen. You'll see a list of all currently added mail accounts.

steps.title: Tap Add Account.
steps.content: Tap Add Account . This is at the bottom of any added accounts.

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . The Google sign-in screen will appear.

steps.title: Enter your Google account email address and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your Google account email address and tap Next . If you want to create a new Gmail address , tap Create account , and then follow the on-screen instructions provided by Google.

steps.title: Enter your password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your password and tap Next . If you forgot your password, you'll need to reset it .

steps.title: Select which items to sync.
steps.content: Select which items to sync. You can sync your email, contacts, calendars and notes to your iPhone or iPad. To sync an item, slide its corresponding switch to on (green). To disable syncing for an item, slide its corresponding switch to off (white).

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. Your Google account is now added to your iPhone or iPad. When you use the Mail app , you'll see your Google account. To only view your Gmail inbox, tap Mailboxes in the top-left corner and select your Google account.

steps.title: Open Gmail on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Gmail on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the multicolored M with a white background. If this is your first time using Gmail, enter your login information to add your Google account. This method shows you how to add additional accounts.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This is in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Add another account.
steps.content: Tap Add another account . If you have a lot of accounts added, you may need to scroll down to find this option.

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . This is the first option. If prompted, tap Continue to allow the app to use the Google website to sign in.

steps.title: Enter your Google account email address and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your Google account email address and tap Next . If you want to create a new Gmail address, tap Create account , and then follow the on-screen instructions provided by Google.

steps.title: Enter your password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your password and tap Next . If you forgot your password, you'll need to reset it. The Google account will be added to the Gmail app. To switch accounts, tap the profile icon in the top-right corner, and then tap the account.

steps.title: Go to https://www.google.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.google.com/ in a web browser. You can use Safari , Chrome , or another mobile browser.

steps.title: Tap Sign in.
steps.content: Tap Sign in . This is at the top-right corner. If you already have an account signed in, tap the profile picture in the top-right corner. Then, tap Add account .

steps.title: Enter your email address and tap Next .
steps.content: Enter your email address and tap Next . If you have other accounts added to your browser, tap Use another account first.

steps.title: Enter your password and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your password and tap Next . You'll be signed into your Google account. To switch between accounts, tap your profile picture in the top-right corner. Select the account you want to switch to.
